funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by NIH/NIGMS grant 2 R01 GM080533 to CRP and ECH. ECH was supported by an NHMRC Australia Fellowship. BTG was supported by the RAPIDD program of the Science & Technology Directorate, Department of Homeland Security, and the Fogarty International Center, National Institutes of Health and DHS contract HSHQDC-12-C-00058. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
